name: becomingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is worn or done becomingly, it is worn or done in a way that is attractive and that suits the person wearing or doing it: Teenagers these days know how to lower their chin and look into the camera lens becomingly through their upper lashes and pout. She looked formidable in a becomingly sharp business suit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe racing driver was becomingly modest after his victory, giving much of the credit to his pit crew. The executive was becomingly dressed in a charcoal suit with a blue tie and black dress shoes.
